The competition "Friends of Ya Ramadan"
19  March,  2024
In partnership with Best Buddies – Qatar and Ibn Taymiyyah Secondary School for Boys
,
they organize a Ramadan competition concerned with integrating people with disabilities and their partners
,
encouraging them to religious activities and strengthening their association with the holy month of Ramadan
,
where secondary and preparatory schools participated in the competition with a friendship system by reciting the Qur'an
,
hadith and ears
